Name: Bourbon Skin
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-heat a Toddy glass .
Prepare thick long orange zest twist for the garnish.
POUR all ingredients into warmed glass and stir.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Hot, watered-down bourbon stirred with orange oils. Simple but very tasty.
History: The only difference between a 'skin' and a 'toddy' is the addition of citrus peel to skin cocktails.
Nutrition: One serving of Bourbon Skin contains 175 calories
